timeline.message: Support customizable event loop creation for server. Issue #2590
Support customizable event loop creation for server. Issue #2590
Apply configured timeout to service discovery
Centralize construction of RxHttpClient instances & remove ClientScope
Remove nonsensical configure method from DefaultHttpClient

Use shared event loop group with server and allow configurable groups

Fixes #2590
Correctly support native transports in HTTP client
Allow named HTTP clients to inherit defaults. Fixes #2213
